attributes.additional_details: The government have lied constantly to it's people and they will continue to bring the country to it's knees, a huge proportion of the country are being let down by our leaders and it's time for the people to have their say before it's too late.
attributes.background: To call up a national General election, the current government has failed it's people by lying and misleading voters. The public should be given the choice to vote again.

rejection.details:
We already have a petition open on this subject, which you may wish to sign here:

Dissolve Parliament and call a General Election now!
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/750050
